aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.body: “MyACUVUE™ Point” is a point collection privilege given to ACUVUE® consumers who purchase ACUVUE® products or take actions set by ACUVUE®.
aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.point1: Become a MyACUVUE™ member for collecting “MyACUVUE™ Point”.
aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.point2: Simply make a purchase of ACUVUE® contact lenses at participating optical stores or ACUVUE® TO HOME to collect MyACUVUE™ points.
pointsPage.title: MyACUVUE™ Points

aboutAcuvuePage.description: MyACUVUE™ is a point accumulation rewards program where you are allowed to redeem and enjoy promotional rewards based on the points you earned over a period of time.
aboutAcuvuePage.copyrightText: This application is published by Johnson & Johnson Pte. Ltd. which is solely responsible for its content. This application is intended for use by residents of Thailand.

pointsTermsAndCondition.title: Terms & Conditions
pointsTermsandCondition.info: Johnson & Johnson collects your personal information to include you in our Loyalty Membership Program, and to create relevant experiences and offers for you. If you do not provide this information, we cannot include you in the program. Your personal information may be processed and stored outside your country of residence and further may be shared with third party providers who assist with managing this program. Further information on how we handle your personal data is contained in our Privacy Policy
